column2: "Ya, it's you. It seems that recently there's been a fake ARKS member who has been perplexing everyone."
"How are you? You know that there's no reason to hesitate right?"
"It doesn't matter what it looks like, if it brings pain to others, then the only option is to destroy it. Criminals must be judged."
"If you're having trouble defeating it because it looks human, remember that it's not human on the inside."
"Looking back, regretting, and reflection can wait, doing what needs to be done comes first."
"Dealing with anguish and hesitating to fight is not something we have the luxury of."
"When I was young, I kept everything inside me while I..."
